All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
This class represents an account owned by a user.
AccountType
This class represents an account type with an id and a type.
AddUser
This class handles the logic behind the addUser.fxml file.
Atm
The class handles the logic behind the atm.fxml file.
BankerAdmin
The class handles the logic behind the bankerAdminPage.fxml file.
ChartValue
A class representing a value to be displayed in a line chart.
ClientProfile
This class handles the logic behind the clientProfile.fxml file.
ConfirmationDialog
This class represents a confirmation dialog.
ConfirmTransaction
This class handles the logic behind the confirmTransaction.fxml file.
DataHolder
This is a singleton class that holds instances of various objects.
DataSource
This class provides a singleton instance of a database connection to the MySQL database.
LineChart
The class is responsible for managing and displaying a line chart.
Loan
This class represents a loan requested by a client.
LoanForm
This class handles the logic behind the 'loanForm.fxml' file.
LoanInfo
This class handles the logic behind the 'loanInfo.fxml' file.
LoanInterface
This interface contains methods for finding information about a loan.
LoanSummary
This class handles the logic behind the 'loanSummary.fxml' file.
Login
The class handles the logic behind the loginPage.fxml file.
MainApplication
This is the main class of the Bank Application.
Menu
The class handles the logic behind the left menu (menu.fxml) from the banker or admin page.
MyAlert
This class handles the logic behind the myAlert.fxml file.
MyAlertInterface
This interface contains custom alert functionalities.
MyRandomGenerator
This interface contains methods for generating random values.
MyValidation
This interface is used for validating user input in a JavaFX application.
NewTransaction
This class handles the logic behind the newTransaction.fxml file.
PDFHolder
This class creates a PDF with detailed information about a loan.
PieChart
This class is responsible for creating and initializing the PieChart UI component.
Profile
This class handles the logic behind the profile.fxml file.
SearchClient
This class handles the logic behind the searchClient.fxml file.
ShowBalance
This interface performs how an amount should be displayed.
SplashScreen
This class handles the logic behind the splashScreen.fxml file.
Transaction
This class represents a transaction.
UpdateTables
This interface helps to update the database's tables when the application starts.
User
This class represents a user with id, first name, last name, email, phone number, date of birth, pin, username, password, type, loan eligibility and date it was created.
UserDetailsDialog
This class handles the logic behind the userDetailsDialog.fxml file.
UserInfo
This class handles the logic behind the userInfo.fxml file.
UsersData
This class handles the logic behind the usersData.fxml file.
